TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationCompletedEventArgs extends System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information about a workflow instance that has completed its execution.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example inspects the WorkflowApplicationCompletedEventArgs passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays information about how the workflow completed.
[!code-cs[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.activities.work_5_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the completion state of the workflow instance, which indicates whether the workflow instance completed successfully, was canceled, or faulted.
Docs.value: The completion state of the workflow instance, which indicates whether the workflow instance completed successfully, was canceled, or faulted.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationCompletedEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays information about how the workflow completed.
[!code-cs[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.activities.work_8_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains the values of s of the workflow instance’s root activity, keyed by argument name.
Docs.value: A dictionary that contains the values of s of the workflow instance’s root activity, keyed by argument name.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationCompletedEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays information about how the workflow completed.
[!code-cs[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.activities.work_5_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the exception associated with the termination of the workflow instance.
Docs.value: The exception associated with the termination of the workflow instance.

remarks.format:
